name: Agricultural
description: Raised on a farm or in a rural area, with a focus on farming and manual labor.

name: Artisanal
description: Raised as a member of a crafting or trade organization, with a focus on a specific trade.

name: Bardic
description: Raised among storytellers, musicians, and keepers of oral tradition who preserve the myths and legends of the land.

name: Clan member
description: Raised in a close-knit family or community with a strong sense of shared identity and loyalty.

name: Criminal
description: Raised in an environment of crime and lawlessness, with a focus on deceit and survival.

name: Cult
description: Raised among secretive practitioners of arcane arts, taught that forbidden knowledge is power while learning to conceal your true nature from the outside world.

name: Cursed
description: Born with visible marks of arcane power, raised in fear and isolation, learning to control dangerous abilities while hiding from those who would destroy you.

name: Hunter-gatherer
description: Raised in a nomadic or semi-nomadic community that relies on hunting and gathering for survival.

name: Isolated
description: Raised in a remote location, with little contact with other people.

name: Mercantile
description: Raised in a family or community engaged in trade and commerce.

name: Militaristic
description: Raised in a military environment, with a focus on discipline, strategy, and combat.

name: Monastic
description: Raised in sacred precincts serving divine powers, learning rituals, prophecies, and the mysteries that lie beyond mortal understanding.

name: Noble
description: Born into a wealthy and influential family, with a focus on luxury and social status.

name: Nomadic
description: Raised in a traveling community, with a focus on adapting to new environments and survival skills.

name: Orphan
description: Raised in an orphanage, with a focus on self-reliance and survival.

name: Peasant
description: Raised as a low-status farmer or laborer, with a focus on hard work and survival.

name: Scholar
description: Raised in a scholarly environment, with a focus on education, history, and ancient texts.

name: Seafaring
description: Raised in a family or community that makes a living from the sea, with a focus on sailing, fishing, and navigation.

name: Servitude
description: Raised as a servant in a household or estate, with a focus on obedience, loyalty, and performing menial tasks.

name: Shamanistic
description: Raised in a community that follows shamanistic spiritual practices and beliefs.

name: Slums
description: Raised in a poverty-stricken, urban environment, with a focus on survival and making a living in harsh conditions.
